question.questionText: Explain in one sentence what each graph tells you. Graph B) speed of light versus time.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: As time increases, the speed of light stays the same (remains constant).

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: How fast the light speeds and how many times it goes.
This graph shows that the light was getting lighter and lighter by the minute.
The speed of light does not change over time.
The light is staying the same and the time is increasing.
